website_summaries.verdict: This pH meter is affordable and easy for beginners to calibrate and use
pros: Plastic cap and carrying case for safe storage when not in use
Gives clear results within a few seconds
Calibration takes only a minute or two
cons: This meter may give you a slightly inaccurate reading if the temperature is very hot or cold

customer_reviews.title: Wildly inaccurate. Reading changed depending on the angle of ...
customer_reviews.text: Wildly inaccurate. Reading changed depending on the angle of insertion into my water by as much as 1.8. When it stabilized it was drastically different then the tried and true drops. Soaked it in water overnight per the instructions hopeing this would be a simple remedy, however it seemed to be even more sensitive to the angle of insertion the next morning. I would have killed my plant if I relied soley on this meter. Just missed my return window so in the trash it went, along with the name Risantec. Those of you that are using this as your only means of measurment, I would suggest checking it against the drops or another proven meter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the box I knew something was wrong. The instructions that came with the tester showed signs of being wet and had rust stains. After removing the instructions from the storage case I noticed that there were no calibration chemicals for the tester. I tried the tester anyway to see if it work. It turned on for a little bit gave out a 7.3 for hard tap water and then shut off. The tester looks like it needs calibration right out of the case, which I cannot do since there are no chemicals with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Came calibrated (Though I calibrated it again just to be sure) and it has been working great. I like how easy this is to calibrate, and I saved the calibration stuff in a jar to re-use for a while. Probably should give me a few months before I need to get any more. Definitely would recommend this one. EDIT: I liked it so much I've now purchased a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Superb customer service
customer_reviews.text: I made an error calibrating my tester - used all three solutions, so results were poor. I emailed the seller, who provided clearer calibration instructions. I wasn't able to calibrate it, so the seller send me a replacement at no charge. The new tester worked properly as received and after calibrating it with two of the solutions per the instructions. Excellent customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want for your pool or tub.
customer_reviews.text: Getting the PH balance correct for my new spa had been the hardest thing in keeping my tub right. With a little research I came across this meter and so far it has worked like a charm. What has separated this from the pack though is the support. Even though I haven't had any problems, they have contacted me twice to make sure that one, I was happy with my purchase and then a follow up days later to make sure again. That is some fantastic customer service.
customer_reviews.author: I. Diot

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I dropped it in my aquarium by mistake, I dried the batteries and the tester for a days and it still Works perfectly. I have another tester almos 3 times more expensive and both give me the same readings but this one does it faster.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: The window was clear again and it gave me a good reading. Checked it in reference solutions and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this little meter per the reviews. The first time I used it the window fogged up a bit and I was going to return it. My other meter took a dive and I grabbed this one. The window was clear again and it gave me a good reading. Checked it in reference solutions and it was with in .02 high in the 7.1 solution. Spot on in the 10 and .06 high at 4. I use it every day now. It has stayed in range and has been very reliable. Not bad for 20 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Enough bang, for my buck(s).
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after reading several reviews on the web and this little meter came in 2nd and 3rd in several lists. The price was perfect. It seems to be right in line with the litmus strips I use as backup. The description differed slightly, but the seller took care of the matter extremely quick and professionally. This seller really surprised me with how they resolved the issue. 5 stars to them
customer_reviews.author: J.J.

customer_reviews.title: Enlightening
customer_reviews.text: I was AMAZED at how I have been misled by some companies selling water for high prices, that is no better than the water coming out of my faucet. So glad I bought this PH Meter that will save me a ton of money that I would have wasted on bottled water that is no better then tap water.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Kreckman

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a relatively inexpensive product that seems to work well. Next time, I will buy their products again. I emailed a question to them and their CEO responded with the information I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Donald H. Sabathier

customer_reviews.title: 4.0 Solution ERROR
customer_reviews.text: It will not calibrate. After calibrating in the 6.8 solution I cleaned it with RO water before calibrating in 4.0 solution, and get an ERR message. I mixed several batches of 4.0 solution and even bought more 4.0 off Amazon to make sure it wasn't bad solution. Might be a great PH meter...but didn't work well for me. Update: The Seller just sent me a new unit out of the blue, and it works! Great customer service...Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Larissa G.

customer_reviews.title: Temperature Uncompensated pH meter
customer_reviews.text: This digital pH meter unfortunately has a significant temperature bias. My hot tub temperature typically varies between 90 and 104 F (40 C). At 104 F the pH meter reports 7.0 but when the water sample cools to room temperature, say 74 F, meter reads 7.7. In order to make precise and hopefully accurate readings I must pull the water sample and wait for it to cool to room temperature. A superior meter would be temperature compensated.
customer_reviews.author: Carchie

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product If you are looking for a reliable ...
customer_reviews.text: This product worked the first three times I used it. Then it just quit. I replaced batteries but it did not help the situation. I would not recommend this product If you are looking for a reliable PH meter. This is the first bad review I have ever written. I hope I never have to write one again..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pH device
customer_reviews.text: The perfect device for measuring accurately the pH of pool water. Device calibration is a breeze. I have crossed checked the measurement using Taylor Technology test kits and was a perfect match. You can trust the readings of this device but make sure you re-calibrate it periodically. Calibration powders (pH 4.01, 6.86 and 9.18) with clear instructions come with the device.
customer_reviews.author: GJH

customer_reviews.title: This PH meter is a nice PH meter and works well
customer_reviews.text: This PH meter is a nice PH meter and works well. It's easy to use and has large readout numbers that are easily seen. I had a bit of an issue at first when trying to regulate it, but was able to get it balanced after a few tries. The meter comes with a nice fitting cap and is a good size. It can fit in your pocket. I will use this seller again as the product was delivered quickly and without incident.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Wood

customer_reviews.title: Works as Described
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to test my drinking water PH. The calibration is pretty straight forward and went as described. Seems to be a pretty accurate tool after testing it on some know values.
customer_reviews.author: Bill's Take

customer_reviews.title: Worked good for a few months
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for a few months. Eventually it got too far out and it just gives a error message when trying to calibrate it. Seems to be junk at that point. Save up and buy a better model.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Howes

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service ever!
customer_reviews.text: hands down the best customer support that I've ever had. Got the product but had some torn up test packets, I responded to their email about leaving a review with what had happened, got a response 5 mins later with new packets in the mail. So far the test are right on to my chemical test, but it's instant! Currently use it for my saltwater tank.
customer_reviews.author: LANCE R NOELL

customer_reviews.title: Lasted About A Year
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews about this one and it was even on a tech website getting reviewed with others alike. So I chose this one, It came and it was perfect, I think I only had to calibrate it once during its life. About a week ago I used the product and it worked fine. Now its stuck at 0.46 when i turn it on and when I try to calibrate it, it just gives me error as it can't re calibrate. I guess this is the end of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Never got it to work consistently in my salt water pool. Tested it multiple times against my strips and it wasn’t close to the strips. Not sure why?
customer_reviews.author: Timothy L. Freund

customer_reviews.title: Quick, Accurate and Economical!
customer_reviews.text: I received the meter very promptly and have already used it a few times. Calibration was easy especially by watching a Youtube tutorial and it appears accurate when I compare meter results against a liquid ph test. I will stick with the meter as a sole source tester for ph. It is very easy to use and seams to give reliable readings. I have ordered new ph powder for future calibration. This is definitely a good product at a great price with great customer support by the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: needs reset constantly
customer_reviews.text: Reads ph accurately 1 or 2 times then needs recalibrated. Pain in the neck.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: can't calibrate at 4.01 level
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I cannot get the meter to calibrate at the 4.01 level. It wanders around the 3.0 reading. The other calibration solutions work perfectly. I checked the solution with another meter and it was 4.01. So, its nothing wrong with the solution. I really can't trust it. They did give me a choice between returning it for full refund or replacement though.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Make sure u have batteries whenn openeing
customer_reviews.text: When it fot here the batteries were died. And it took me 4 stores to find the right size batteries. And doeant come with great instructions. Had to look on YouTube.☺ Reading was a little off but not to bad.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Limited Use
customer_reviews.text: The product was easy to use and read. Unfortunately, it only worked less than ten times over the less than six months I had it before giving up - faded digital display and doesn’t always turn on. Could be a battery issue, but seems crazy for a product I have barely used.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: and it works great. Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am using the PH meter to measure Kombucha tea, and it works great. Very easy to use. I initially tried it in soil, which was my bad. It did not like that, and broke. The company however is amazing, and reached out to me asking how I liked it. I told them I broke it through user error, and they gave me a new one. I highly recommend companies that care about their customers, and this company does. The product is great, the company is better.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this recently to measure my new hot tub's ...
customer_reviews.text: Edited to 5 stars for great customer service. Very quick response, proper resolution, and even some tips on operating the device. Very honest company that stands by their products. I purchased this recently to measure my new hot tub's pH, however it stopped working after calibrating and measuring once. It worked well when it measured initially. I reached out to the support email to try and find a resolution (replacement?). Probably just a dud!
customer_reviews.author: tyler cookson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, excellent service
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent. Working as described. The customer service is amazing and extremely helpful.
customer_reviews.author: sean m. warden

customer_reviews.title: Good Solution, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Works well and fairly easy to calibrate. The calibration powders need to be mixed with 250 ml of distilled water. That is one CUP and & 1 TBSP. I placed the solutions in sealed plastic containers and check occasionally. So far I have not needed to recalibrate but I have only been using it for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well takes the guesswork out of PH question.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our hot tub. It is sometimes difficult to determine what the PH level is on those strips since the color isn't always true to the guide on the bottle. This takes the guesswork out of it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: So far it works fine. Comes with a list of things and their ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it works fine. Comes with a list of things and their ph to test it for accuracy and some packets for calibrating if needed. As long as whatever you test is stirred well and you wait long enough for it to finish cycling up or down, it gives an accurate reading. This, the litmus and the drops have all read the same so far and this thing is much less hassle!
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer focus - Excellent easy to use product!!
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Comes with convenient ph packs to calibrate it, wasn't expecting that. Nice protective case but doesn't fit exactly right, but at least it came with one. Very easy to use and seller is absolutely fantastic at customer follow-up communication via email which isn't too intrusive or anything. I will definitely buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B

customer_reviews.title: This meter is easy to calibrate and use
customer_reviews.text: This meter is easy to calibrate and use. It's durable, portable, lightweight, and easy to rinse between tests. This is a serious meter, but it is also tons of fun for use in the kitchen and for teaching kids about pH and acidity vs. alkalinity.
customer_reviews.author: Prof

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Meter!
customer_reviews.text: A pH Meter could not get simpler than this one! It is very easy to use and better yet, it is so easy to calibrate, and calibrate accurately! I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Koz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use this meter every day to check against online meters, works gret
customer_reviews.author: Rick Hiatt

customer_reviews.title: Horribly inaccurate. I didn't know how bad it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Horribly inaccurate. I didn't know how bad it was until I had chemical processing problems. Bought a much higher end unit to prove my test methods, and even after multiple recalibration it was off by over 2 in either direction. Spend more money and get a higher quality unit.
customer_reviews.author: ROB B.

customer_reviews.title: making this tool entirely useless now.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't figure out the calibration. I thought I had it calibrated, but an hour later when I tried using it, tap water was reading just over 9. It only came with one set of calibration powders, so I cannot try again, making this tool entirely useless now.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat over complicated - save your money
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this again - unless all you have time to do is to calibrate the thing. After reading the directions - I actually threw the thing away. I use the paper test strips to test my hot tub water...
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Works great once calibrated
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I had to calibrate it right out of the box. According to my chemical tests this read very low and in error. Once calibrated, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: It should last longer than a year!
customer_reviews.text: After a year it does not calibrate, reads Errr when I attempt to calibrate 4.00 and 6.8.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: yo no!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS CRAP! DOESN'T STAY CALIBRATED! oh, if it's stuck on 7.00, just take out the batteries.... what a joke
customer_reviews.author: Doug V

customer_reviews.title: Gave it a rating of four based on the excellent customer service provided by this company
customer_reviews.text: Ended up getting a replacement meter after dropping the first one in water. Customer Service is out of this world, however, the product seems to have trouble stabilizing and gives somewhat inconsistent readings even after calibration. Gave it a rating of four based on the excellent customer service provided by this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this because of reviews and just could not get ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because of reviews and just could not get this thing to calibrate properly. It was very frustrating and it only calibrates to the specific 4.0, 6.86, 9.0 solutions that come with the package. Not a big fan
customer_reviews.author: adan l blevins

customer_reviews.title: Item brand advertise, is not what you going to receive!
customer_reviews.text: Do buy it! You think you are buying the one that they are advertising, nope. They will ship you a cheap "knock off" no name brand tester instead. Don't waste your money on these bait and switch items, that's what they did.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and accurate, don't know how I lived without it. Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Jakeman

customer_reviews.title: Great value in a pH meter.
customer_reviews.text: We got this to use in a 8th grade school demonstration. It worked flawlessly. It seems to be stable in terms of calibration over the few days we have used it. Do soak it for a couple of hours before you use it the first time and store it with some water in the storage cap if you can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to give it a chance
customer_reviews.text: Product came, looking already used. And the readings off the item was all over the place, was not reliable Was reading hoping it would work well
customer_reviews.author: Normeni

customer_reviews.title: Broke after just a week. Been through 2 of ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke after just a week. Been through 2 of these. If they go to far in the water they break. Spend the extra money and get the waterproof one
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work as stated. Calibrated multiple times but it always showed low ph. Almost had me draining my hot tub when a more accurate ph tester shows a perfect 7.6. In short, a waste of money. Spend a little more and get one that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable readings
customer_reviews.text: Used for checking well water. First 2 readings seemed right. Subsequent readings way low. Tested bottled drinking water which only read 5.2. (epa min is 6.5) mixed a strong solution of sodium carbonate & water and meter still reads way low.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Dee

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Never really could get it to work right. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only able to calibrate once and readings were not stable.
customer_reviews.text: Very unstable readings. Could only calibrate it once. I’m sure it could have been replaced if defective, but I chose to spend $20 more and get a more lab grade model.
customer_reviews.author: John T Walentiny

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Thank you for amazing customer service and for ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Thank you for amazing customer service and for being very attentive. I purchased this for an above ground pool. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Isis L.

customer_reviews.title: works better than other
customer_reviews.text: not sure if i need to temp correct for pool and hot tub. works better than other options
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: This works great! I can finally get an accurate PH of ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great! I can finally get an accurate PH of my plant nutrient mixes that are often colored making it difficult to use the traditional PH test solutions that base PH on color. This meter was easy to calibrate and is quick and simple to use. We'll see how long it lasts as I've only had it for a few weeks but I'm sure it'll hold up fine no more than I'll be using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Could not get to collaborate after multiple tries. Ended up using old fashion ph strips
customer_reviews.author: HMarie

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, comes with reference packets for calibration. Definitely recommend this over test strips.
customer_reviews.author: I'm Rich James

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled. A ph meter should be at least close to correct
customer_reviews.text: Cheap inaccurate junk and a complete waste of money. I calibrated 2 meters including this one and was off .35 immediately after being placed back in the same solution. The other ph meter was spot on.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: 1 Stars
customer_reviews.text: im sitting on two new ones neither works correctly,do yourself a favor and get an OAKTON,i know i wont get a reply??
customer_reviews.author: BOSTON56

customer_reviews.title: No easy way to get additional calibration materials
customer_reviews.text: First off, it required calibrating and there was only one package of calibrating powders (requires mixing). No easy way to get additional calibration materials, so once its out of calibration it's worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Kenneth Lipscomb

customer_reviews.title: Great little tester!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great little pH tester! Works as it should, comes with calibrating powders.
customer_reviews.author: bcmark

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and good value.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to calibrate. Keep your calibration solutions for repeated use - they are designed for that. Quick and accurate read. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Dahlseid

customer_reviews.title: Nice, not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Convenient way to measure ph. However, it takes a while to stabilize a reading, and it suggest recalibration if it gets dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer #375

customer_reviews.title: Not enough powder to recalibrate
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use for swimming pool reference. It works great, but the calibrating powdered water got thrown away and I can't recalibrate it
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Scarbrough

customer_reviews.title: great company to deal with
customer_reviews.text: very easy to use, good price company good at being interested in my business
customer_reviews.author: brian j gonyea

customer_reviews.title: Great PH Meter
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to test our water for our hydroponic garden. We have used it to test our house water and a couple other sources. It is very easy to use and read.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Warren

customer_reviews.title: For a Spa or Pool owner this meter is a quick, easy and accurate tool to check your PH.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this digital PH meter to test my Spa PH for almost 3 months. I test my water a couple times/week. I also have a Taylor K-2006 test kit and when I've compared the Risantec reading to the K-2006 they have always been spot-on. I get the same results as my Taylor K-2006 without the hassle of counting drops into the sample tube.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We really liked this product we have a water well that supplies ...
customer_reviews.text: We really liked this product we have a water well that supplies to home but we also have city water brought in when the well doesn't produce enough. This is a great way for us to make sure our water is of the quality we need for our home! This Meter is also very easy to use and takes just a minute to use we would highly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works Great, Very accurate once calibrated a great value. Seller shipped fast no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Firestarr

customer_reviews.title: Not quite sure about this tester. It was fairly ...
customer_reviews.text: Not quite sure about this tester. It was fairly cheap, so not a big deal if it doesn't seem quite right. I wouldn't buy it again though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate meter!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was very prompt. The PH Meter works great, it's very high quality and is very accurate. It really saves me the cost of continually purchasing test strips for my hot tub.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Tim Larson

customer_reviews.title: Very short warranty and life span. Poor quality??
customer_reviews.text: Received tester on 5/26 and out of warranty on 6/25 and it only lasted to 6/28. Did not turn back on. Tried new batteries and still would not turn on. Was pretty accurate when it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Dwd63

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Tried for an hour. Company did not answer email. Just a cheap China made waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Linebaugh

customer_reviews.title: Working good so far
customer_reviews.text: Working good so far, shipping was pretty quick and price was reasonable, didn't break after the first use like the last one I bought from another manufacturer. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy, accurate meter.
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy ph meter for use in pool or aquarium water. It responds quickly when immersed, and the readout display is clear and sharp. A very useful, reasonably priced tool.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B.

customer_reviews.title: This product stopped working correctly after about 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Use this to check my reservoir PH once a day. Became inaccurate by the 10th day, had to recalibrate it. Now it’s juat stuck on 5.4 and won’t read anything.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Hijjawi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to understand calibration
customer_reviews.text: Had to wait a couple months to see how it worked before I wrote a review. Well I use the meter daily and it dose what it suppose to. Checked it with other meters and it's rite on. Easy to understand calibration. Simple to operate and it wasn't very expensive. Good job😀
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: I found the use of this for measuring the pH ...
customer_reviews.text: I found the use of this for measuring the pH of my hot tub to be very helpful. Much more accurate than test strips. It makes it much easier to get the pH of the water correct.
customer_reviews.author: pval-guy

customer_reviews.title: Hot Tub Happy
customer_reviews.text: I have just begin using the meter, but so far it works as I expected. I did not have distilled water when it arrived but our Portland water is very close right from the tap. I would like to re-calibrate unit now that I have distilled water and wonder if/where I can obtain additional packets of the calibration agents.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Wells

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to calibrate and is very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this meter. Extremely easy to calibrate and is very accurate. The only reason for the 4 star is the lack of Back Lighting other then that I am very happy with this Purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: Small, accurate, easy to use. Great price to boot. Protective shipping case does not fit the meter very well. Otherwise a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: danno101

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well but needs to be calibrated often for accurate results.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: PH meter
customer_reviews.text: This ph meter was bought for a friend and it was exactly what he wanted. Says it works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great PH meter
customer_reviews.text: Great PH meter for it's price; it does it's function. I will buy another one for my mom soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Would have given 5 stars if not made in china. Good support from seller. Update - love this meter, works well!
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: ... as planned and follow up by Risantec was the best of any company that I have dealt with
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was as planned and follow up by Risantec was the best of any company that I have dealt with.Have used meter a few times already and it works as expected. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: garybeau

customer_reviews.title: Excellent instrument
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Easy to use, great quality. Easy to read. Great support.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Used item. And wrong brand
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a new Risantic brand PH reader. And got this used cheap brand reader. It was so used that I had to use a knife to pop the cap off.
customer_reviews.author: Javier perez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product showed up as expected and it’s a fine, precise and could not do what I do without it
customer_reviews.author: Mitch white

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: My unit came with two corroded batteries that damaged the unit. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Schierer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and easy to use. I bought this to help regulate the chemistry of our spa and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and very easy to use. Confirmed test results with pool store and readings are accurate.

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of broken cases

customer_reviews.author: Lmorrow70507

customer_reviews.title: Can not re-calibrate after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work fine at first but now, after 9 months, i am not able to calibrate it. How do i get a replacement or refund?
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Stiff

customer_reviews.title: I Am Liking It
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have used this periodically for a month to check the pH of my spa. As I'd hoped, it is a whole lot easier than using indicators and appears to be more accurate. Obviously I cannot comment on its longevity. My one complaint is in regards to the sparse instruction set for the initial calibration. IMHO they could have used another paragraph or two to clearly show the methodology, maybe even some diagrams - particularly for the higher pH calibration. Once that is accomplished (even with confusing instructions it only took 30 minutes), using the meter is a snap. If the device lasts, and I've no reason to expect otherwise, I'd probably rate at 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Works well, easy to use, and comes with a nice plastic case for safe keeping. Also comes with instructions on how to calibrate it in case you need to. It worked fine on my hot tub without calibration. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Larry S.
